00051 // ===========================================================================
00052 // method definitions
00053 // ===========================================================================
00054 bool
00055 TraCIServerAPI_Polygon::processGet(TraCIServer& server, tcpip::Storage& inputStorage,
00056                                    tcpip::Storage& outputStorage) {
00057     std::string warning = ""; // additional description for response
00058     // variable & id
00059     int variable = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00060     std::string id = inputStorage.readString();
00061     // check variable
00062     if (variable != ID_LIST && variable != VAR_TYPE && variable != VAR_COLOR && variable != VAR_SHAPE && variable != VAR_FILL
00063             && variable != ID_COUNT) {
00064         server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Get Polygon Variable: unsupported variable specified", outputStorage);
00065         return false;
00066     }
00067     // begin response building
00068     tcpip::Storage tempMsg;
00069     //  response-code, variableID, objectID
00070     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(RESPONSE_GET_POLYGON_VARIABLE);
00071     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(variable);
00072     tempMsg.writeString(id);
00073     // process request
00074     if (variable == ID_LIST || variable == ID_COUNT) {
00075         std::vector<std::string> ids;
00076         ShapeContainer& shapeCont = MSNet::getInstance()->getShapeContainer();
00077         for (int i = shapeCont.getMinLayer(); i <= shapeCont.getMaxLayer(); ++i) {
00078             shapeCont.getPolygonCont(i).insertIDs(ids);
00079         }
00080         if (variable == ID_LIST) {
00081             tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRINGLIST);
00082             tempMsg.writeStringList(ids);
00083         } else {
00084             tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00085             tempMsg.writeInt((int) ids.size());
00086         }
00087     } else {
00088         Polygon* p = 0;
00089         ShapeContainer& shapeCont = MSNet::getInstance()->getShapeContainer();
00090         for (int i = shapeCont.getMinLayer(); i <= shapeCont.getMaxLayer() && p == 0; ++i) {
00091             p = shapeCont.getPolygonCont(i).get(id);
00092         }
00093         if (p == 0) {
00094             server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Polygon '" + id + "' is not known", outputStorage);
00095             return false;
00096         }
00097         switch (variable) {
00098             case VAR_TYPE:
00099                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRING);
00100                 tempMsg.writeString(p->getType());
00101                 break;
00102             case VAR_COLOR:
00103                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_COLOR);
00104                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(static_cast<int>(p->getColor().red() * 255. + .5));
00105                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(static_cast<int>(p->getColor().green() * 255. + .5));
00106                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(static_cast<int>(p->getColor().blue() * 255. + .5));
00107                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(255);
00108                 break;
00109             case VAR_SHAPE:
00110                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_POLYGON);
00111                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(MIN2(static_cast<int>(255), static_cast<int>(p->getShape().size())));
00112                 for (unsigned int iPoint = 0; iPoint < MIN2(static_cast<size_t>(255), p->getShape().size()); ++iPoint) {
00113                     tempMsg.writeDouble(p->getShape()[iPoint].x());
00114                     tempMsg.writeDouble(p->getShape()[iPoint].y());
00115                 }
00116                 break;
00117             case VAR_FILL:
00118                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_UBYTE);
00119                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(p->fill() ? 1 : 0);
00120                 break;
00121             default:
00122                 break;
00123         }
00124     }
00125     server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_OK, warning, outputStorage);
00126     server.writeResponseWithLength(outputStorage, tempMsg);
00127     return true;
00128 }
00129 
00130 
00131 bool
00132 TraCIServerAPI_Polygon::processSet(TraCIServer& server, tcpip::Storage& inputStorage,
00133                                    tcpip::Storage& outputStorage) {
00134     std::string warning = ""; // additional description for response
00135     // variable
00136     int variable = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00137     if (variable != VAR_TYPE && variable != VAR_COLOR && variable != VAR_SHAPE && variable != VAR_FILL
00138             && variable != ADD && variable != REMOVE) {
00139         server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Change Polygon State: unsupported variable specified", outputStorage);
00140         return false;
00141     }
00142     // id
00143     std::string id = inputStorage.readString();
00144     Polygon* p = 0;
00145     int layer = 0;
00146     ShapeContainer& shapeCont = MSNet::getInstance()->getShapeContainer();
00147     if (variable != ADD && variable != REMOVE) {
00148         for (int i = shapeCont.getMinLayer(); i <= shapeCont.getMaxLayer() && p == 0; ++i) {
00149             p = shapeCont.getPolygonCont(i).get(id);
00150             layer = i;
00151         }
00152         if (p == 0) {
00153             server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Polygon '" + id + "' is not known", outputStorage);
00154             return false;
00155         }
00156     }
00157     // process
00158     int valueDataType = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00159     switch (variable) {
00160         case VAR_TYPE: {
00161             if (valueDataType != TYPE_STRING) {
00162                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The type must be given as a string.", outputStorage);
00163                 return false;
00164             }
00165             std::string type = inputStorage.readString();
00166             p->setType(type);
00167         }
00168         break;
00169         case VAR_COLOR: {
00170             if (valueDataType != TYPE_COLOR) {
00171                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The color must be given using an accoring type.", outputStorage);
00172                 return false;
00173             }
00174             SUMOReal r = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00175             SUMOReal g = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00176             SUMOReal b = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00177             //read SUMOReal a
00178             inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00179             p->setColor(RGBColor(r, g, b));
00180         }
00181         break;
00182         case VAR_SHAPE: {
00183             if (valueDataType != TYPE_POLYGON) {
00184                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The shape must be given using an accoring type.", outputStorage);
00185                 return false;
00186             }
00187             unsigned int noEntries = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00188             PositionVector shape;
00189             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < noEntries; ++i) {
00190                 SUMOReal x = inputStorage.readDouble();
00191                 SUMOReal y = inputStorage.readDouble();
00192                 shape.push_back(Position(x, y));
00193             }
00194             shapeCont.reshapePolygon(layer, id, shape);
00195         }
00196         break;
00197         case VAR_FILL: {
00198             if (valueDataType != TYPE_UBYTE) {
00199                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "'fill' must be defined using an unsigned byte.", outputStorage);
00200                 return false;
00201             }
00202             bool fill = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() != 0;
00203             p->setFill(fill);
00204         }
00205         break;
00206         case ADD: {
00207             if (valueDataType != TYPE_COMPOUND) {
00208                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "A compound object is needed for setting a new polygon.", outputStorage);
00209                 return false;
00210             }
00211             //readt itemNo
00212             inputStorage.readInt();
00213             // type
00214             if (inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() != TYPE_STRING) {
00215                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The first polygon parameter must be the type encoded as a string.", outputStorage);
00216                 return false;
00217             }
00218             std::string type = inputStorage.readString();
00219             // color
00220             if (inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() != TYPE_COLOR) {
00221                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The second polygon parameter must be the color.", outputStorage);
00222                 return false;
00223             }
00224             SUMOReal r = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00225             SUMOReal g = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00226             SUMOReal b = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00227             //read SUMOReal a
00228             inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00229             // fill
00230             if (inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() != TYPE_UBYTE) {
00231                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The third polygon parameter must be 'fill' encoded as ubyte.", outputStorage);
00232                 return false;
00233             }
00234             bool fill = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() != 0;
00235             // layer
00236             if (inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() != TYPE_INTEGER) {
00237                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The fourth polygon parameter must be the layer encoded as int.", outputStorage);
00238                 return false;
00239             }
00240             layer = inputStorage.readInt();
00241             // shape
00242             if (inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() != TYPE_POLYGON) {
00243                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The fifth polygon parameter must be the shape.", outputStorage);
00244                 return false;
00245             }
00246             unsigned int noEntries = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00247             PositionVector shape;
00248             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < noEntries; ++i) {
00249                 SUMOReal x = inputStorage.readDouble();
00250                 SUMOReal y = inputStorage.readDouble();
00251                 shape.push_back(Position(x, y));
00252             }
00253             //
00254             if (!shapeCont.addPolygon(id, layer, type, RGBColor(r, g, b), fill, shape)) {
00255                 delete p;
00256                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Could not add polygon.", outputStorage);
00257                 return false;
00258             }
00259         }
00260         break;
00261         case REMOVE: {
00262             if (valueDataType != TYPE_INTEGER) {
00263                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The layer must be given using an int.", outputStorage);
00264                 return false;
00265             }
00266             layer = inputStorage.readInt();
00267             if (!shapeCont.removePolygon(layer, id)) {
00268                 bool removed = false;
00269                 for (int i = shapeCont.getMinLayer(); i <= shapeCont.getMaxLayer(); ++i) {
00270                     removed |= shapeCont.removePolygon(i, id);
00271                 }
00272                 if (!removed) {
00273                     server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Could not remove PoI '" + id + "'", outputStorage);
00274                     return false;
00275                 }
00276             }
00277         }
00278         break;
00279         default:
00280             break;
00281     }
00282     server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POLYGON_VARIABLE, RTYPE_OK, warning, outputStorage);
00283     return true;
00284 }
